p: Additionally, we tested 976 adult Hg. leucocelaenus and 19 Hg. janthinomys obtained from eggs collected in the same areas (Domingos Martins, Macaé, Maricá, Valença, Teresópolis and Belmiro Braga) and time in which infected females were detected, but all were negative, providing no evidence of vertical transmission.
